title: Krista thisen hlu tak chhuak chu
lyrics:
Krista thisen hlu tak chhuak chu,
Ka tan a hlu a ni;
Hlauhna leh rinhlelhna ata,
Ka thlarau a chawl ta.

Aw, thisen lui mak tak a luang,
Chhandamna atang chuan;
Van thlen thlenga ka hla tur chu
Aw thisen, thisen hlu.

"An sualna leh atnate chu,
Ka hre reng tawh lo vang;
An tan ka Fapa a thi si,"
Lal Pathianin a ti.

Ka sual ka hriat chhuah fote hian,
Min tithlaphang lo vang;
Chu thisen hlu chuan a tleng fai,
A kai dum zawngte nen.

He ka taksa chak lo tak hian,
Natnate tawk mah se,
Chu thisen hlua ka chawlh chuan,
Thlamuangin ka thi ang.
